headline: What is driving the EV sales slowdown, according to one analyst
summary: Sales of new electric vehicles are starting to slow. In the video above, RBC Capital Markets lead equity analyst for global autos Tom Narayan explains one thing that may be causing the slowdown. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: EV tax credit: Buyers get some extra wiggle room
summary: Want to buy an electric vehicle before the tax credit expires? New IRS guidance may give buyers a little extra breathing room to make the purchase. Yahoo Finance Senior Autos Reporter Pras Subramanian explains in the video above. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: Tesla, GM, Ford EV buyers get extra breathing room ahead of tax credit expiration
summary: Prospective buyers of EVs from Tesla, GM, Ford, and others have a little extra time to complete an EV purchase as the Sept. 30 deadline approaches.

summary: General Motors and Hyundai team up to co-develop five vehicles, aiming to counter low-cost Chinese rivals and rising trade-war pressures.

headline: Will Ford Pro's Market Share Gains in the US and Europe Continue?
summary: Ford Pro drives Ford's growth with rising U.S. and Europe market share, strong service expansion, and resilient high-margin revenues.

headline: Get more fleet vehicle power, faster charging at idle with APS UPI alternators available in 48V, 24V and 12V models
summary: American Power Systems, Inc. (APS) recently launched the Ultra Performance at Idle (UPI) series, its next-generation line of high output alternators that provide more output across the board at both lower and upper RPM. In addition, the increased power output at lower RPM means faster charging capability at lower speeds, including at idle.

headline: TSLA or F: Which Stock Deserves a Place in Your EV Portfolio?
summary: Tesla faces sliding deliveries and shrinking margins, while Ford's EV reset aims at scale and affordability to attract the next wave of buyers.

headline: Cars Are So Expensive That Buyers Need Seven-Year Loans
summary: McCullough, a licensed clinical social worker in North Carolina, has been trying to eliminate debt from her life while documenting the process on TikTok.  After she posted about the $45,000 Pilot, bought in 2023, a viewer commented that they’d never heard of Honda Motor Co. offering loans lasting seven years.  McCullough hadn’t realized the loan’s length.

raw.headline: Cars Are So Expensive That Buyers Need Seven-Year Loans

McCullough hadn’t realized the loan’s length.

headline: What Ford Motor (F)'s New Universal EV Platform Launch Means For Shareholders
summary: On August 11, 2025, Ford Motor Company unveiled its new Universal EV Platform and Production System, aiming to deliver affordable, high-quality electric vehicles with streamlined manufacturing and innovative battery technology, starting with a midsize electric pickup slated for 2027 launch. This move marks a significant step in Ford’s push to simplify vehicle production, reduce costs through fewer parts and faster assembly, and enhance competitiveness in the evolving EV market. We’ll explore...
